name: Lost in Darkness (Qoma)
description:
Lost in Darkness is Party-Based Fantasy RPG, where you will be able to recruit companions, build your party and simultaneously control up to three characters.

This has been something i was working on in my free spare time, trying to bring it to life quite some time now.
Currently there is only one scene in game, but hopefully i'll add more of them in future, all together with more playable characters.
There are few quests that you can do inside the village, loot chests, test abilities, collect materials and craft some items.
You can find all ability books and crafting recipes inside the stash, that is located inside the locked house. 

Have fun ;)
